conversation_history.content: Welcome, King Kong. Is there something I can assist you with, or would you like to chat?
That's not correct, King Kong. I don't have a personal name. I'm here to provide information and help with any questions or concerns you may have.
Paris is a beautiful city, King Kong. What brings you to that part of the world? Are you enjoying the sights and culture?
It can be challenging to balance personal and public life, King Kong. Are you and Sarah enjoying time together in Paris?
